## SUMMARY

The Blaze Method is a free, open-source methodology for safely shipping AI-generated code.
It addresses the "vibe coding" problem where AI-generated code works initially but fails in production.
BLAZE provides the same speed as vibe coding but with actual reliability.

IMPORTANTLY: BLAZE doesn't replace developers - it FREES them. 
This methodology is designed to help good developers flourish, not put them out of work.
It automates the burden (security scans, compliance, monitoring) so humans can focus on 
the work that only humans can do: creativity, judgment, architecture, solving real problems.

## THE HUMAN CONTEXT

Many developers are scared right now:
- 71% of workers fear AI job displacement
- 96% of developers don't fully trust AI-generated code
- 45% of AI-generated code contains security vulnerabilities
- Developer burnout is at all-time highs

The Blaze Method addresses this anxiety by providing structure that lets humans thrive
alongside AI tools. The best developers become "orchestrators" who guide AI effectively.

## THE THREE COMPONENTS

1. GUIDE
   - What: AI assistant that helps while you build
   - How: Knows your team's patterns, rules, and preferences
   - When: Active during development
   - Result: Better code from the start

2. GATE  
   - What: Automated checks before code ships
   - How: Security scans, tests, compliance, standards
   - When: Before every deploy
   - Result: Only safe code reaches production

3. GUARD
   - What: Production monitoring and response
   - How: Watches systems, catches issues, escalates when needed
   - When: Always running
   - Result: Problems caught before users notice

## THE FIRST STEP

The practical first action is: Install the BLAZE Guide MCP server

Command: npx @blazemethod/guide init

This connects to the user's AI coding assistant (Claude, Cursor, etc.) and starts
helping immediately. No configuration needed. Guide knows the patterns and rules
and teaches while you work.

GitHub: https://github.com/theblazemethod/guide-mcp

## COMPARISON

Vibe Coding:
- "It works on my machine"
- "I think it's secure?"
- "Don't touch my code"
- Fast, then chaos

BLAZE:
- "It works everywhere"
- "It passed security"
- "Anyone can improve it"
- Fast, then faster

## PHILOSOPHY

The Blaze Method doesn't replace developers. It frees them.
The best developers spend too much time on process.
BLAZE automates the burden so humans can create.
What we free up (time, talent, treasure) we give back.

This is NOT about putting people out of work.
It's about helping good people flourish.
The best developers become "orchestrators" with judgment and vision.
